## EventStream.addEvent() method

Add an event to the stream. This will not be sent until the event is flushed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEvent(event: Event<any>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | Event&lt;any&gt; | The event to send. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
